TopicTitle: [Bug] Whenever I try to launch a spacecraft I see an empty void with the spacecraft there

Articles.Content: Title explains it. When I launch something, there's no grass... No nothing. I'm not really sure how to reproduce it considering I just found out it happened today. Also, It wasn't my ship, as the pre-assembled ships had the same problem.
Hi _Nick, disable anti-aliasing in the KSP settings
